name: 林律吟
objective: In this class, the principle and application of electrochemistry will be introduced, including ions interaction and balance, conductivity of electrolyte, interfacial phenomena, electrode voltage and analysis techniques.
schedule:
Week 1 No class
Week 2 Chapter 1 Introduction
Week 3 Potential of reversible battery 
Week 4 Potential of reversible battery 
Week 5 Potential of reversible battery 
Week 6 First mid-term
Week 7 Chapter 4  irreversible electrode process 
Week 8 Chapter 4  irreversible electrode process 
Week 9 Chapter 4  irreversible electrode process 
Week 10 Chapter 4  irreversible electrode process 
Week 11 Chapter 4  irreversible electrode process 
Week 12 Second mid-term
Week 13-17 Paper report
scorePolicy:
1. present/absent 10% 
2. Mid-term 25% each 50% total
3. Paper report 30% Paper query 10%
